body: HE HAS A FUCKING CRIMSON OMEN SHIRT OHHHHHHHHHHHHH. GEARS OF WAR!!!!!!!!! THAT GAME WAS ONE OF MY FIRST SHOOTERS AND IS FANTASTIC.

On page 11 
That guy have on his Tshirt gears of war logo ???? What some kind of advertising ?
The Lazarus H release is better because it doesnt have the annoying line in the middle of the two page spreads.
